text: Misery Guts is a book by the award winning Australian author Morris Gleitzman. This is a story about a kid named Keith who lives in London and his parents who own a fish and chip shop. This parents for a long time have not had many customers. Keith is dedicated to trying to make the store better and cheer up his parents so they won't be Misery Guts for the rest of their lives. He tries everything including some crazy stunts. The story continues in the hilarious sequel Worry Warts. The book did not sell very well. As of November 2007, the "Misery Guts/Worry Warts" combination was ranked #3,465,204 in books sold by Amazon. A television series was made based on this book. ==References== == Other websites == * [https://www.amazon.com/Misery-guts-Morris- Gleitzman/dp/0663592674/ref=sr_1_67?ie=UTF8&s;=books&qid;=1196417979&sr;=1-67 Misery Guts] on Amazon.com * Category:1998 books Category:Children's books Category:Australian literature
title: Misery Guts
